channel.title: Ip changers 317 pi
channel.description: How do I stop people who use Ip changers from coming into my server ( sorry if wrong section jsut need immediate help ) Well this guys harrassing me but is on a vpn or ip changing so i cant ipban him or anything anyone know how?

item.title: Ip changers 317 pi
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Get another banning method.

Read full topic

item.title: Ip changers 317 pi
item.dc:creator: @jamie233 jamie233
item.description:
@jamie233 wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:2, topic:509268”][quote author=jamie233 link=topic=627511.msg4264271#msg4264271 date=1363819638]
Well this guys harrassing me
[/quote]

He can’t harass you if you’re not online. Log out.
If he’s harassing your players, that’s a different story. You should try adding this UUID banning (bans by the player’s MAC address and the date windows was activated):
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/tutorials/427669-pi-uuid-banning.html[/quote]
I meant me and my players but thanks alot of errors putting it into my source but fixing them slowly but surely

Read full topic

item.title: Ip changers 317 pi
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

jamie233:

Well this guys harrassing me

He can’t harass you if you’re not online. Log out.
If he’s harassing your players, that’s a different story. You should try adding this UUID banning (bans by the player’s MAC address and the date windows was activated):
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/427669-pi-uuid-banning.html

Read full topic
